It includes a 1/2 yard piece of white on white.
We made a quilt from this - see pics below....pattern is FREE with the purchase of this sale bundle.
Yes!  A sale bundle and a free pattern.
Holiday Happiness!!

name: Amy Butler, Kaffe, Anna Maria Horner, Valori Wells + more
description:
This Westminster, Rowan, Free Spirit Bundles is a hand picked assortment of these fabrics and designers, including some traditional prints.
Eighteen (18) fat quarters.
We made an Irish Chain with this, along with the "Irish Chain" Linens/Kona bundle also on this site!!
100% quilting cotton.
Purchase both bundles, and we will send you the Eleanor Burns Irish Chain book FOR FREE!!!!!!!

name: beyond the reef pattern - aloha bears
description:

of course, full size pattern pieces

name: Ruth Ann Double Border - Gray Michael Miller
description:
This fabric was something I just could not walk away from.
I hope you like our sea glass colorway that we selected.  They call it grey, we call it sea glass summer!

description:

name: Madison Cottage Design Lemon Pepper
description:
MY FAVORITE.
Kenna Ogg's pattern Lemon Pepper.
Once you make one of these, you'll make a dozen more.
This will be your new "go to" pattern.  I promise.

name: Madison Cottage Design Field Greens
description:
You saw it first at beyond the reef at Road to California in January of this year.
Everyone else saw it at Spring Market 2012 in May.

name: CREATIVE GRIDS 60 degree
description:
This is the 60 degree triangle used in the 21 Madison Cottage project.
This is the smaller ruler, not the 12" ruler.
The tutorial is posted for this project on beyondthereefpatterns.blogspot.com

name: Flea Market Pattern - Quiltin' Cousins
description:
This is the pattern I used for Garrett's graduation quilt.
This pattern is designed by Shawn at Quiltin' Cousins.
The quilt (on her pattern) is 64 x 73.
This is a simple laminated card pattern, 8.5 x 11, no picture, only drawing of the quilt.
